title: Photoredox-catalyzed sulfonylation of diaryliodonium salts with DABSO and silyl enolates involving the insertion of SO2
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14697-14701
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02773F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shuoshuo Zhang, Qian Zhang, Shuizhen Lin, Xinkui Lin, Xiaolei Huang
A versatile photoredox-catalyzed three-component sulfonylation of diaryliodonium salts with DABSO and silyl enolates involving the insertion of SO2 for the synthesis of β-keto sulfones was developed.
